Package graphics

Class SpriteLoader

java.lang.Object
graphics.SpriteLoader
public class SpriteLoader extends Object
Handles the loading and drawing of sprite images.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public static void draw(Graphics g, String type, int xPx, int yPx, int size)
      Draws an arbitrary sprite. If the sprite cannot be loaded, the missing sprite texture is drawn. The specified type can be any sprite in the assets/sprites folder.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics object to draw the tile on.
      type - the path, after assets/sprites to the sprite file. This path does not include a leading slash or a file extension.
      xPx - the x position of the top-left corner of the sprite.
      yPx - the y position of the top-left corner of the sprite.
      size - the size to draw the sprite.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if g == null.
      NullPointerException - if type == null.

    • drawTile

      public static void drawTile(Graphics g, Level.Tile type, int xPx, int yPx, int tileSize)
      Draws a tile. If the sprite cannot be loaded, the missing sprite texture is drawn.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics object to draw the tile on.
      type - the type of the tile, as defined by the Map.Tile enum.
      xPx - the x position of the top-left corner of the tile.
      yPx - the y position of the top-left corner of the tile.
      tileSize - the size of the tile.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if g == null.
      NullPointerException - if type == null.

    • drawEntity

      public static void drawEntity(Graphics g, String type, int xPx, int yPx, int size, double rad)
      Draws an entity (excluding the player). If the sprite cannot be loaded, the missing sprite texture is drawn. The player and weapon textures can be drawn with this method, but not at once. For the player to be drawn with their weapon in the appropriate location, use the drawPlayer method.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics object to draw the entity on.
      type - the type of entity to draw, as defined by the getType method of the entity.
      xPx - the x position of the top-left corner of the entity.
      yPx - the y position of the top-left corner of the entity.
      size - the size of the entity's collision area.
      rad - the angle, in radians relative to the unit circle, to rotate the sprite before drawing.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if g == null.
      NullPointerException - if type == null.

    • drawPlayer

      public static void drawPlayer(Graphics g, Player player, int xPx, int yPx, int tileSize, double rad)
